languages.text: {n}Когда песнь завершается, рыжеволосый удивленно смотрит на вас. Взгляд его чуть теплеет.{/n} "Ты, вижу, однажды пригубил{mf||а} мьода скьяльдов. В Длинном зале нашлись бы мои братья, которые захотели бы рассказать тебе о своих подвигах, чтобы ты сложил{mf||а} о них вису".

{n}When the song ends, the red-haired giant looks at you in surprise, the ice in his eyes thawing slightly.{/n} "You are one who has supped the mjod of the skjalds, I see. In the Long Hall, some of my brothers would be eager to tell you of their exploits so that you would sing a saga of their deeds."
languages.original_text: {n}Когда песнь завершается, рыжеволосый удивленно смотрит на вас. Взгляд его чуть теплеет.{/n} "Ты, вижу, однажды пригубил{mf||а} мьода скьяльдов. В Длинном зале нашлись бы мои братья, которые захотели бы рассказать тебе о своих подвигах, чтобы ты сложил{mf||а} о них вису".

traits.locale_text: {n}When the song ends, the red-haired giant looks at you in surprise, the ice in his eyes thawing slightly.{/n} "You are one who has supped the mjod of the skjalds, I see. In the Long Hall, some of my brothers would be eager to tell you of their exploits so that you would sing a visa of their deeds."
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

In the Long Hall, some of my brothers would be eager to tell you of their exploits so that you would sing a saga of their deeds."
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

languages.text: {n}当红发巨人的歌声结束时，他惊讶地看着你，眼中冰冷的神色稍稍缓和了些。{/n}“我看得出来，你拥有着吟游诗人的天赋。如果这是在长厅里，我的一部分兄弟肯定会渴望将他们的功绩讲给你听。这样一来，你就能写出史诗，将这些故事传唱下去。”
languages.original_text: {n}When the song ends, the red-haired giant looks at you in surprise, the ice in his eyes thawing slightly.{/n} "You are one who has supped the mjod of the skjalds, I see. In the Long Hall, some of my brothers would be eager to tell you of their exploits so that you would sing a saga of their deeds."

traits.locale_text: {n}当红发巨人的歌声结束时，他惊讶地看着你，眼中冰冷的神色稍稍缓和了些。{/n}“我看得出来，你拥有着吟游诗人的天赋。如果这是在长厅里，我的一部分兄弟肯定会渴望将他们的功绩讲给你听。这样一来，你就能写出史诗，将这些故事传唱下去。”
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

languages.text: {n}歌い終わった赤髪の男が驚いた表情でこちらを見ると、目に宿っていた冷たさがわずかに和らいだ。{/n}「あんたはスキャルドのミョードを食べたことがあるみたいだな。ロングホールの兄弟たちもあんたに武勇を語って、一緒にサーガを歌いたがるだろう」
languages.original_text: {n}When the song ends, the red-haired giant looks at you in surprise, the ice in his eyes thawing slightly.{/n} "You are one who has supped the mjod of the skjalds, I see. In the Long Hall, some of my brothers would be eager to tell you of their exploits so that you would sing a saga of their deeds."

traits.locale_text: {n}歌い終わった赤髪の男が驚いた表情でこちらを見ると、目に宿っていた冷たさがわずかに和らいだ。{/n}「あんたはスキャルドのミードを食べたことがあるみたいだな。ロングホールの兄弟たちもあんたに武勇を語って、一緒にサーガを歌いたがるだろう」
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

languages.text: {n}Al terminar la canción, el gigante pelirrojo te mira sorprendido. El hielo de su mirada se derrite levemente.{/n} «Veo que ha bebido el mjod de los skjalds. En el gran salón, algunos de mis hermanos le contarían con sumo agrado sus hazañas para que las inmortalizara en una saga».
languages.original_text: {n}When the song ends, the red-haired giant looks at you in surprise, the ice in his eyes thawing slightly.{/n} "You are one who has supped the mjod of the skjalds, I see. In the Long Hall, some of my brothers would be eager to tell you of their exploits so that you would sing a saga of their deeds."

traits.locale_text: {n}Al terminar la canción, el gigante pelirrojo te mira sorprendido. El hielo de su mirada se derrite levemente.{/n} «Veo que ha bebido el mjod de los skjald. En el gran salón, algunos de mis hermanos le contarían con sumo agrado sus hazañas para que las inmortalizara en un visa».
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

languages.text: {n}Lorsque la chanson prend fin, le géant roux vous regarde d'un air ébahi.{/n} « Je vois que vous avez bu le mjod des skjalds, {n}dit-il sur un ton un peu plus chaleureux.{/n} Nul doute que certains de mes frères, dans le grand hall, voudraient vous raconter leurs exploits pour que vous en fassiez une saga. »
languages.original_text: {n}When the song ends, the red-haired giant looks at you in surprise, the ice in his eyes thawing slightly.{/n} "You are one who has supped the mjod of the skjalds, I see. In the Long Hall, some of my brothers would be eager to tell you of their exploits so that you would sing a saga of their deeds."

traits.locale_text: {n}Lorsque la chanson prend fin, le géant roux vous regarde d'un air ébahi.{/n} « Je vois que vous avez bu le mjod des skjalds, {n}dit-il sur un ton un peu plus chaleureux.{/n} Nul doute que certains de mes frères, dans le grand hall, voudraient vous raconter leurs exploits pour que vous en fassiez des vísur. »
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

languages.text: {n}Am Ende des Lieds sieht dich der rothaarige Riese überrascht, das Eis in seinem Blick scheint ein wenig zu tauen.{/n} "Ihr habt den Mjod der Skalden bereits genossen. In der langen Halle berichten meine Brüder gerne von ihren Taten, auf dass andere von ihnen singen."
languages.original_text: {n}When the song ends, the red-haired giant looks at you in surprise, the ice in his eyes thawing slightly.{/n} "You are one who has supped the mjod of the skjalds, I see. In the Long Hall, some of my brothers would be eager to tell you of their exploits so that you would sing a saga of their deeds."

traits.locale_text: {n}Am Ende des Lieds sieht dich der rothaarige Riese überrascht, das Eis in seinem Blick scheint ein wenig zu tauen.{/n} "Ihr habt den Mjod der Skalden bereits genossen. In der langen Halle berichten meine Brüder gerne von ihren Taten, auf dass andere von ihnen singen."
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

languages.original_text: {n}When the song ends, the red-haired giant looks at you in surprise, the ice in his eyes thawing slightly.{/n} "You are one who has supped the mjod of the skjalds, I see. In the Long Hall, some of my brothers would be eager to tell you of their exploits so that you would sing a saga of their deeds."

languages.text: {n}Kızıl saçlı dev, şarkı sona erdiğinde sana şaşkınlıkla bakıyor. Gözlerindeki soğukluk, bir miktar azalıyor.{/n} "Görüyorum ki skjaldların mjodundan yudumlamışsın. Uzun Salon'da kardeşlerim, cesaretleri adına destan okuyabilmen için sana kahramanlıklarını büyük bir hevesle anlatırdı."
languages.original_text: {n}When the song ends, the red-haired giant looks at you in surprise, the ice in his eyes thawing slightly.{/n} "You are one who has supped the mjod of the skjalds, I see. In the Long Hall, some of my brothers would be eager to tell you of their exploits so that you would sing a saga of their deeds."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kızıl saçlı dev, şarkı sona erdiğinde sana şaşkınlıkla bakıyor. Gözlerindeki soğukluk bir miktar azalıyor.{/n} "Görüyorum ki skjaldların mjodundan yudumlamışsın. Büyük Salon'da kardeşlerimden bazıları, sana kahramanlıklarını büyük bir hevesle anlatırlardı ki cesaretleri adına bir destan söyleyebilesin."
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison
